attributes.action: ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THE BRITISH PEOPLE NO LONGER WANT TO BE PART OF A CORRUPT GLOBALIZED SUPERSTATE THAT HAS GONE TOO FAR IN SURPRESSING PERSONAL FREEDOMS AND IS GUILTY OF CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this time all of us are being short changed by a Global Ruling class elite .People from Developing Nations are getting paid less for their Labour and Products Whilst we in the Developed world are paying more and also working for less income.The IMF are pushing Debt not just upon poorer nations but through TV ads into every household (The USA Federal Reserve Bank is not Govt owned but Privately owned).The W.T.O is now in the  Process of outlawing vitamins and Health Products Unless sold by one of the Big Pharmaceutical Companies In addition to this by 2009 .You will not be able buy or trade in Meat or Produce that HAS NOT BEEN Irradiated and injected with Bovine steroid .This is estimated it is going to cause 3 BILLION DEATHS in the developing nations Because Their Governments can not fall in line in time with this Policy.Wars are now being waged under false pretenses so Oil Pipelines can be put in at a time when alternatives to fossil fuels are abundant       .Big Business has been running this world for some time .Unfortunately into the Ground
